attributes.review: I opened the app and this nasty smell started pouring out of my phone (it Low key smelled like Cheetos and fake tanning lotion). Anyways the app doesn’t even work because it’s clearly racist, homophobic, and xenophobic. It’s definitely not just a glitch because Trump is racist, homophobic, xenophobic, and more so clearly this app needs to be taken down ASAP and never come back into existence again. Also that smell is low key wack, I didn’t know that was possible🤭🧚🏻💗🤮💓😳🧚🏻🧚🏻
